attributes.action: force the Environment Agency senior executive to pay back their 5 figure bonuses in light of recent serious flooding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Environment Agency's  about us section reads "We are the leading public body for protecting and improving the environment in England and Wales. It's our job to make sure that air, land and water are looked after by everyone in today's society, so that tomorrow's generations inherit a cleaner, healthier world."
They have failed in this goal and so should not be rewarded.
